root.message: All metadata fields for the indicator 13-3-2, translated into en
root.data: Objective 13. Take urgent action to combat climate change and its repercussions213.3 Improve education, awareness and individual and institutional capacities regarding adaptation to climate change, mitigation of its effects and reduction of its impact and early warning systems13.3.2 Number of workshop reports on capacity building for monitoring environmental or climate change issuesMinistry of the Environment, Agriculture and LivestockMBAZUMUTIMANA DieudonneStatistical serviceSDG focal point within the Ministry79548571dembaze@yahoo.frNumber of workshop reports on capacity building for monitoring environmental issues or climate changeNumberAnnual report on the achievements of the OBPEAdministrative dataAnnualAnnualMINEAGRIEMINEAGRIEThe Ministerial departments are the members of the SSN whose mission is to collect, process and disseminate the data of their sector.The indicator is relevant because it reflects the state of environmental protectionThe exhaustiveness of this indicator depends on the regular reporting of the activities carried out in this area.Counting of workshop reports on capacity building for monitoring environmental or climate change issuesThis indicator is validated internally onlyThe indicator is available at national levelThe indicator can be compared to other indicators of the same type at regional and international levelAnnual activity report, 2016
